sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROUERGUE a province oſ France, in the government of Guienne ; bounded on the eaſt by the Cevennes and Gevaudan, on the weft by Querci, on the north by the ſame and Auvergne, and on the ſouth by Languedoc. It is 75 miles in length, and 50 in breadth ; not very fertile, but ſeeds a number of cattle, and has mines of copper, iron, alum, vitriol, and ſulphur. It is divided into a county, and the upper and lower marche. Rhodez is the capital town.
